questions.question: What is Wkeel?
questions.answer: Our product is a cutting-edge solution made to give everyone in the MENA region quick and easy access to laws, rules, and legal information, facilitating access to justice. It is an effective and useful tool for attorneys, law students, and business owners because it also creates simple template contracts.

questions.question: How does Wkeel's AI operate?
questions.answer: The AI searches through a vast collection of laws, rules, and legal knowledge using sophisticated algorithms. It can comprehend your questions, locate pertinent data, and deliver it easy-to-use.

questions.question: Can I draft contracts with the tool's assistance?
questions.answer: Yes, a basic template contract can be generated by our tool. This tool is intended to save you time when drafting contracts by assisting you in understanding their structure.

questions.question: Does the tool have any biases?
questions.answer: Our AI was created to be impartial. Regardless of a user's identity or background, it offers the same level of service and handles all queries similarly.

questions.question: In what ways might this product benefit me as a student, practitioner, or business owner?
questions.answer: Our application may build basic template contracts, help you understand laws and regulations, and more, depending on your needs. It can also give you instant access to legal information. It is intended to help you save time and increase accessibility to legal research.

questions.question: If I use this tool, do I still require representation from a lawyer?
questions.answer: Absolutely, it is advisable to speak with a qualified lawyer who can offer advice unique to your case. Although our AI-powered legal technology tool can quickly and effectively retrieve laws, rules, and legal data, and it can even assist in creating simple template contracts, it cannot take the place of competent legal counsel. Although the tool is meant to help with legal research and give you a better knowledge of legal issues, it is always advisable to see a lawyer for specific legal advice catered to your particular situation.

questions.question: What happens if the tool is inaccurate?
questions.answer: Although we aim for precision, no instrument is flawless. If you see an error, do let us know. We're determined to grow from our mistakes and make the required adjustments.

questions.question: How can I give the tool some feedback?
questions.answer: We appreciate your opinions! You can get in touch with us personally or submit comments via the platform. We are dedicated to lifelong learning and development, and we are able to enhance our product thanks to your input.

questions.question: How do I know that the data the tool provides is reliable?
questions.answer: Our technology is made to deliver precise and trustworthy data. It gathers information from reliable sources and updates it frequently to make sure it is accurate.

questions.question: How is data security and privacy ensured by the tool?
questions.answer: We are very serious about protecting your privacy and data. We handle your inquiries in a secure manner and never divulge your information without permission. To guarantee the security of your information, we abide by stringent data protection guidelines.

questions.question: Is the tool compliant with AI laws?
questions.answer: Yes, we abide by all applicable AI-related rules and regulations. We pledge to keep abreast of legal requirements and modify our procedures as needed.
